title: Negation
description: Hey, welcome! In this level we are going to demonstrate the use of the logical 'not' operator.
As you can see, there are already an A at the premise, hence the whole proof entails A. Nevertheless, our goal is to disprove A.
The card you have right now is called the logical 'not' operator, it simply negates the value of the variable. (e.g. If A is true, then Â¬A is false).
Click on the card, then click the green placeholder at the FRONT of A to place the operator to the front of A!
Hooray! Now you have disproven A, well done!
